publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3129 Iain Smith: University of St Andrews Students' Association - Landlords' Charter-That the Parliament welcomes the publication by the University of St Andrews and the University of St Andrews Students' Association of the Landlords' Charter for Rental to Students in St Andrews and, in particular, the co-operation between landlords and the Students' Association in agreeing the terms of the charter which will help to ensure that students in St Andrews will be able to rent high quality accommodation which is properly maintained and safe whilst landlords will be assured of responsible tenants, and believes that this initiative will help foster better relations between town and gown in St Andrews.
S1M-3129 University of St Andrews Students' Association - Landlords' Charter (lodged on 17 May 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3129 University of St Andrews Students' Association - Landlords' Charter (lodged on 17 May 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3129 University of St Andrews Students' Association - Landlords' Charter (lodged on 17 May 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-3129 University of St Andrews Students' Association - Landlords' Charter (lodged on 17 May 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
